Strangely the handler contribution items are only created when selecting a different view of the workbench after the editor was opened from the wizard. However, if the editor is opened in the command handler (which is possible because the wizard offers a blocking open method) the same method correctly updates the toolbar.

Additionally a check was introduced which displayes an error message if the file could not be created instead of the editor going berserk.
